resources.string: This application is only to be used for personal/non-commercial purposes. Please read the TOS Section.

Additionally, some icons have been distributed under the CC-BY 4.0 license and are copyrighted by Google, Inc.The full icon set is available at https://www.google.com/design/icons.

API Service by YoutubeInMp3(youtubeinmp3.com)

As written in Youtube Terms of Service,

"You shall not download any Content unless you see a “download” or similar link displayed by YouTube on the Service for that Content.You shall not copy, reproduce, make available online or electronically transmit, publish, adapt, distribute, transmit, broadcast, display, sell, license, or otherwise exploit any Content for any other purposes without the prior written consent of YouTube or the respective licensors of the Content. YouTube and its licensors reserve all rights not expressly granted in and to the Service and the Content." [Source: https://www.youtube.com/static?template=terms ( goto section 5B)].

So, You are violating Youtube TOS while using YouP3. The developer isn't intended to do that and doesn't support that, and takes to responsibility for what you do using YouP3.
